headlines.description: Liverpool extended their Premier League winning run against Sheffield United thanks to a horrible goalkeeping error from Dean Henderson.
headlines.shortLinkText: GK error sees Liverpool extend winning PL run

events.name: West Ham United at AFC Bournemouth

headlines.description: West Ham United's Aaron Creswell scored a late goal to extend their unbeaten Premier League run to six games with a 2-2 draw against Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cresswell extends West Ham's unbeaten run

headlines.description: Second-half goals from Jay Rodriguez and Chris Wood helped Burnley come from behind twice in a 2-2 Premier League draw with Aston Villa on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Burnley fight back twice to draw 2-2 at Villa

headlines.description: Chelsea recorded their first Premier League home victory of the season after beating Brighton 2-0 at Stamford Bridge on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Willian, Jorginho earn Chelsea first PL home win

headlines.description: Crystal Palace's Luka Milivojevic and Andros Townsend struck either side of halftime for a deserved 2-0 home win over Norwich City.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rock-solid Palace beat Norwich at Selhurst Park

headlines.description: Harry Kane was the hero for Tottenham as they beat Southampton 2-1 in spite of playing with 10 men for an hour and goalkeeper Hugo Lloris' howler.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kane spares Lloris' blushes as Spurs beat Saints

headlines.description: Wolverhampton Wanderers defeated Watford 2-0 at Molineux to claim first Premier League victory of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves cruise past Watford to claim first PL win

headlines.description: Gabriel Jesus, Riyad Mahrez, and Raheem Sterling scored as Manchester City beat Everton in an entertaining match.

video.headline: Do Manchester City need to address defence?

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL (Do Manchester City need to address defence?) 2019/9/28 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Man City beat Everton to keep pace in PL race
